SENT.plain: Pure red cell aplasia (PRCA) is a rare condition described in patients with chronic kidney disease during alpha-Epo treatment subcutaneous administered generated by anti-R-Epo antibodies
Recently two cases of PRCA have been reported in patients affected by myelodysplastic syndrome treated with R-Epo
We described one more case of PRCA in a patient with refractory anemia treated with R-Epo
